description:
While Kaname works with the cops to catch a pervert, Sousuke tries to protect her - and quickly becomes a suspect in the case! Later, Kaname and Mizuki try to scare Sagara in an abandoned hospital.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fetish del far comprare sotto minaccia / Patient delle tenebre
Le fétichiste importun / Les patients des ténèbres
O Fetiche Da Venda Forçada! - O Paciente Da Escuridão!
Oshiuri no Fetish / Kurayami no Patient
The Hard Sell Fetish / The Patient of Darkness
押し売りのフェティッシュ / 暗闇のペイシェント
